Html:
WPF Hands-On Lab: Get Started with the Prism Library (updated) is missing a step to show the Shell.  May serve as a frustration point for users new to the Prism library as step 10 indicates the shell should show.

pagdoc@microsoft.com link at bottom of documentation was kicked back as invalid email.
This discussion has been copied to a work item. Click here to go to the work item and continue the discussion.
Thanks for the feedback.  I'll pass this on to the rest of team so we can deal with it.
We've fixed the email. Thanks for letting us know. You should be able to use it now.

Hi Bill,

I've just walked through the whole WPF Hands-on Lab again and  I haven’t experienced this issue. It is possible that you may have missed a step.

Can you please try again, especially the 9 steps of the Bootstrapper section,  and provide us of more information to reproduce the issue if you are still having it?

Thanks,

Diego

Actually it was step 5 that I overlooked (multiple statements on one line).   My bad, I appreciate your time and effort on the matter!  I'm accustomed to using CreateShell() and overlooked InitializeShell() while preparing my material.
